name: Banhmi Maker
description: The objective of this game is to make as many Banhmi as you can in the time allowed, without sacrificing quality. A Banhmi with a variety of toppings will be ordered. Drag the toppings onto the bun. Add the bun top after all the requested toppings have been added. Use up all the requested toppings for full execution points. Spread the toppings evenly for full presentation points.
